CascadableCard - Interface in uno.card
A cascadable card is a card that its action can be cascaded if applied on each other.

chooseCard(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.player.HumanPlayer
Asks user to choose a card from current player's cards and returns the chosen card.
chooseCard(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.player.Player
At the player's turn, chooses a card from player's hand and returns chosen card.
chooseColor(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.player.Player
At the player's turn, chooses a color for player and returns chosen color.

ColoredCard - Class in uno.card
A colored card in Uno game, that is cards that have a color.

ComputerPlayer - Class in uno.player
Determines a semi-intelligent computer player that can choose its next card based on some simple heuristics.
ComputerPlayer(String) - Constructor for class uno.player.ComputerPlayer
Computer player constructor
createCardWithColor(Color) - Method in class uno.Store
Creates all colored cards with specified colore as follows: - One numeric 0 card of each color, totally 4,
- two numeric 1-9 cards of each color, totally 36,
- two skip cards of each color, totally 8,
- two reverse cards of each color, totally 8,
- two 2+ cards of each color, totally 8,
createWildCards() - Method in class uno.Store
Creates all wild cards as follows:
- four wild colors,
- four wild draws
cycleEndActions() - Method in class uno.UnoGame
Determines end game and print winner and al scores
cycleStartActions() - Method in class uno.UnoGame
Prints rotation, turn, and cards of player, card number of players and print ground card.
